select ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content as content, ic.sepc_name as sepcName, ic.created_time as createdTime, u.face as face, u.nickname as nickname FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN users u ON ic.user_id = u.id where ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level =#{paramsMap.level}

select i.id as id, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price FROM items as i left join items_img as ii on i.id = ii.item_id left join ( select item_id,min(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec group by item_id )tempSpec on i.id = tempSpec.item_id where ii.is_main = 1
and i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc

select i.id as id, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price FROM items as i left join items_img as ii on i.id = ii.item_id left join ( select item_id,min(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec group by item_id )tempSpec on i.id = tempSpec.item_id where ii.is_main = 1 and i.cat_id = #{paramsMap.catId} order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc

SELECT t_items.id as itemId, t_items.item_name as itemName, t_items_img.url as itemImgUrl, t_items_spec.id as specId, t_items_spec.`name` as specName, t_items_spec.price_discount as priceDiscount, t_items_spec.price_normal as priceNormal FROM items_spec t_items_spec LEFT JOIN items t_items ON t_items.id = t_items_spec.item_id LEFT JOIN items_img t_items_img on t_items_img.item_id = t_items.id WHERE t_items_img.is_main = 1 AND t_items_spec.id IN
#{specId}
